name: NBCNews
text:
"I am raising a 7-year-old black son with autism spectrum disorder. If you ask his favorite color, singular, he will reply 'red white and blue like the American flag.'"

In their words: Why black men and women are protesting for George Floyd. https://t.co/7dFbHxWQyX
